availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born in Kentucky in 1830. Married Mary Jane Gastineau in 1859. Pulsaki County Merchant in 1860. Employed James Doolin in 1860. Died in 1895.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pulaski County, District 1, p. 163. Dodd, Jordan, comp. Kentucky Marriages, 1851-1900 [database on-line]. Provo, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations Inc, 2001. Find A Grave, Entry for James Doolin (1830-1895), Find A Grave Memorial #12554688, Eden Cemetery, Somerset, Pulaski County, Kentucky, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=12554688 (accessed 14 June 2016).
